list.name: Start of Event Frame & Notes
list.rawQuery:
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(EventFrame.StartTimestamp) as time_sec, GROUP_CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(Note.Timestamp, '%m/%d/%y %H:%i'), ' - ', Note.Note ORDER BY Note.Timestamp SEPARATOR '
') AS text, CONCAT(Element.Name, ',', EventFrameTemplate.Name, ',', 'Start') AS tags FROM Note INNER JOIN EventFrameNote ON Note.NoteId = EventFrameNote.NoteId INNER JOIN EventFrame ON EventFrameNote.EventFrameId = EventFrame.EventFrameId INNER JOIN Element ON EventFrame.ElementId = Element.ElementId INNER JOIN EventFrameTemplate ON EventFrame.EventFrameTemplateId = EventFrameTemplate.EventFrameTemplateId WHERE EventFrame.EventFrameId IN ($eventFrame)

list.name: End of Event Frame
list.rawQuery:
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(EventFrame.EndTimestamp) AS time_sec,
	'' AS text,
	CONCAT(Element.Name, ',', EventFrameTemplate.Name, ',', 'End') AS tags
FROM EventFrame
	INNER JOIN Element ON EventFrame.ElementId = Element.ElementId
	INNER JOIN EventFrameTemplate ON EventFrame.EventFrameTemplateId = EventFrameTemplate.EventFrameTemplateId
WHERE EventFrame.EventFrameId = $eventFrame

list.name: Lookups
list.rawQuery:
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(TagValue.Timestamp) AS time_sec,
	LookupValue.Name AS text,
	CONCAT(Element.Name, ',', AttributeTemplate.Name) AS tags
FROM ElementAttribute
	INNER JOIN Element ON ElementAttribute.ElementId = Element.ElementId
	INNER JOIN EventFrame ON Element.ElementId = EventFrame.ElementId
	INNER JOIN AttributeTemplate ON ElementAttribute.AttributeTemplateId = AttributeTemplate.AttributeTemplateId
	INNER JOIN Tag ON ElementAttribute.TagId = Tag.TagId
	INNER JOIN Lookup ON Tag.LookupId = Lookup.LookupId
	INNER JOIN TagValue ON Tag.TagId = TagValue.TagId
	INNER JOIN LookupValue ON Lookup.LookupId = LookupValue.LookupId AND
		TagValue.Value = LookupValue.Value
WHERE (EventFrame.EventFrameId = $eventFrame) AND
	(AttributeTemplate.AttributeTemplateId IN ($attributeTemplates)) AND
	Lookup.LookupId IN ($lookups) AND
	IF (EventFrame.EndTimestamp IS NULL, (TagValue.Timestamp >= EventFrame.StartTimestamp), (TagValue.Timestamp >= EventFrame.StartTimestamp) AND
	(TagValue.Timestamp <= EventFrame.EndTimestamp))

targets.rawSql:
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(TagValue.Timestamp) AS time_sec,
	TagValue.Value AS value,
	CONCAT(Element.Name, '_', AttributeTemplate.Name) AS metric 
FROM ElementAttribute
	INNER JOIN Element ON ElementAttribute.ElementId = Element.ElementId
    INNER JOIN EventFrame ON Element.ElementId = EventFrame.ElementId
	INNER JOIN AttributeTemplate ON ElementAttribute.AttributeTemplateId = AttributeTemplate.AttributeTemplateId
	INNER JOIN Tag ON ElementAttribute.TagId = Tag.TagId
	INNER JOIN TagValue ON Tag.TagId = TagValue.TagId
WHERE (EventFrame.EventFrameId = $eventFrame) AND (AttributeTemplate.AttributeTemplateId IN ($attributeTemplates)) AND IF (EventFrame.EndTimestamp IS NULL, (TagValue.Timestamp >= EventFrame.StartTimestamp), (TagValue.Timestamp >= EventFrame.StartTimestamp) AND (TagValue.Timestamp <= EventFrame.EndTimestamp))

list.label: Enterprise:
list.name: enterprise
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT Enterprise.EnterpriseId AS __value, 	Enterprise.Name AS __text FROM Enterprise 	INNER JOIN Site ON Enterprise.EnterpriseId = Site.EnterpriseId 	INNER JOIN ElementTemplate ON Site.SiteId = ElementTemplate.SiteId 	INNER JOIN AttributeTemplate ON ElementTemplate.ElementTemplateId = AttributeTemplate.ElementTemplateId 	INNER JOIN EventFrameTemplate ON ElementTemplate.ElementTemplateId = EventFrameTemplate.ElementTemplateId 	INNER JOIN EventFrame ON EventFrameTemplate.EventFrameTemplateId = EventFrame.EventFrameTemplateId

list.label: Site:
list.name: site
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT Site.SiteId AS __value, 	Site.Name AS __text FROM Site 	INNER JOIN ElementTemplate ON Site.SiteId = ElementTemplate.SiteId  	INNER JOIN AttributeTemplate ON ElementTemplate.ElementTemplateId = AttributeTemplate.ElementTemplateId 	INNER JOIN EventFrameTemplate ON ElementTemplate.ElementTemplateId = EventFrameTemplate.ElementTemplateId 	INNER JOIN EventFrame ON EventFrameTemplate.EventFrameTemplateId = EventFrame.EventFrameTemplateId WHERE Site.EnterpriseId = $enterprise

list.label: Element Template:
list.name: elementTemplate
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT ElementTemplate.ElementTemplateId AS __value, 	ElementTemplate.Name AS __text FROM ElementTemplate 	INNER JOIN AttributeTemplate ON ElementTemplate.ElementTemplateId = AttributeTemplate.ElementTemplateId 	INNER JOIN EventFrameTemplate ON ElementTemplate.ElementTemplateId = EventFrameTemplate.ElementTemplateId 	INNER JOIN EventFrame ON EventFrameTemplate.EventFrameTemplateId = EventFrame.EventFrameTemplateId WHERE ElementTemplate.SiteId = $site

list.label: Event Frame Template:
list.name: eventFrameTemplate
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT EventFrameTemplate.EventFrameTemplateId AS __value, EventFrameTemplate.Name AS __text FROM EventFrameTemplate 	INNER JOIN EventFrame ON EventFrameTemplate.EventFrameTemplateId = EventFrame.EventFrameTemplateId WHERE EventFrameTemplate.ElementTemplateId = $elementTemplate

list.label: Event Frame:
list.name: eventFrame
list.query: SELECT EventFrame.EventFrameId AS __value, 	fxGetEventFrameFriendlyName(EventFrameId) AS __text FROM EventFrame WHERE EventFrame.EventFrameTemplateId = $eventFrameTemplate AND 	$__timeFilter(EventFrame.StartTimestamp) ORDER BY StartTimestamp DESC

list.label: Attributes:
list.name: attributeTemplates
list.query: SELECT AttributeTemplate.AttributeTemplateId AS __value, AttributeTemplate.Name AS __text FROM AttributeTemplate WHERE AttributeTemplate.ElementTemplateId = $elementTemplate

list.label: Lookups:
list.name: lookups
list.query: SELECT Lookup.LookupId AS __value, Lookup.Name AS __text FROM Lookup WHERE Lookup.EnterpriseId = $enterprise
